name: Brick City
description:
Interested In Making Dumb Random Maps To Play With Your Friends?
Wanna become a Leader of a group?

Well Player...

You have come to the Right Place!

  • Brick-City contains A Map Editor, so now you can Make maps To Play With Friends!
  • UGC Approved Shirts! UGC Maps UGC Catalog
  • Community Events, Soon to Come Events!

Welcome to Brick-City a fun relaxing multiplayer hangout game where people from all across the world can meet up and mess around, This game's main features are: Multiplayer, Character customizing, Chat, Physics, And more, Join the discord to learn more and make some friends https://discord.gg/RGdTnmSt9X
